title: Divine Blossom Diamond Haaram Set with Jhumkas - Adorable Adornment
features: This exquisite set features a floral-inspired design, where each petal and curve is delicately adorned with shimmering diamonds. The necklace culminates in a statement pendant, featuring a central pear-shaped Emerald, crowned with a Ruby and framed by intricate diamond settings. Dainty pearls dangle from the pendant and jhumkas, adding a touch of traditional elegance. The matching Jhumkas boast the classic bell shape, also studded with diamonds and a Ruby, and finished with pearl droplets.
occasions: and other special occasions. Also suitable for milestone celebrations like seemantham and half-saree function (Langa Voni). Its modern design makes it appropriate for upscale parties and formal events as well.
description: This haaram set is a true masterpiece, showcasing the pinnacle of Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The combination of sparkling diamonds, vibrant gemstones, and lustrous pearls exudes timeless elegance and unparalleled luxury.
